local_intent: Execute a straight push on the T-block (0.1m at 90°) and verify goal proximity, retrying up to three times.
assumptions: Yaw set and light contact established prior to push
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT transfer phase by wrapping Push→Wait→IsAt within RetryUntilSuccessful(3). Uses identical ports/values and preserves verification and retry semantics.
